ROOT.QUERY: WITH PO_PARTIALLY AS (SELECT foucnuf, foulibl, arlcexr, arlcexvl LV, pkstrucobj.get_desc@Heinens_Custom_Prod(1,cclcinrc, ''HN'') ITEM_DESC, cclcexcde, ccldcde, ccldlivd, NVL(cclqtep, cclqtec)/ccluvup NB_CASE_TO_BE_DELIVERED, cclcinlc, cclcinrc, cclseqvlc, ecdetat FROM ccldetccl@Heinens_Custom_Prod, foudgene@Heinens_Custom_Prod, artvl@Heinens_Custom_Prod, cdeentcde@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE cclcfint=foucfin AND foutype=3 AND foucnuf LIKE ''H%'' AND cclstatus IN (3, 5,7) AND arlseqvl=cclseqvlc AND cclcexcde=ecdcexcde AND NVL(cclqtep, cclqtec) >0 ORDER BY ccldcde ASC), DETAIL AS ( SELECT a.cclcexcde PO_NUM, to_char(TRUNC(a.ccldcde),''MM/DD/RR'') ORDER_DATE, foucnuf VENDOR_CODE, foulibl VENDOR_DESC, arlcexr ITEM_CODE, ITEM_DESC, LV, SUM(a.cclqtec/a.ccluvup) NB_CASE_ORDERED, SUM(a.cclqtep/a.ccluvup) NB_CASE_PREP, a.cclcinrc, a.cclsite , a.ccluvup NB_SKU_CASE, LISTAGG(p.cclcexcde || '' [STATUS:'' || ecdetat || '', DLIV:'' || to_char(p.ccldlivd,''MM/DD/RR'') || '']'' , '' - '') WITHIN GROUP ( ORDER BY p.cclcexcde DESC) PO_OPEN, SUM(NB_CASE_TO_BE_DELIVERED) as NB_CASE FROM CCLDETCCL@Heinens_Custom_Prod a, PO_PARTIALLY p WHERE a.cclcinrc=p.cclcinrc AND a.cclstatus > 2 AND a.cclseqvlc=p.cclseqvlc AND a.cclqtec > 0 AND a.cclcexcde != p.cclcexcde AND TRUNC(a.ccldlivd) > TRUNC(p.ccldlivd) GROUP BY a.cclcexcde, foucnuf, foulibl, a.cclcexcde, arlcexr, ITEM_DESC, LV, a.ccldcde, a.cclcinrc, a.cclsite, a.ccluvup) SELECT PO_NUM, ORDER_DATE, VENDOR_CODE, VENDOR_DESC, ITEM_CODE, ITEM_DESC, LV, NB_CASE_ORDERED, NB_CASE_PREP, PO_OPEN, NB_CASE as NB_CASE_TO_BE_DELIVERED, ( SELECT SUM(NVL(storeai, 0) + NVL(storeal, 0) - NVL(storeav, 0) + NVL(storeae, 0) + NVL(storeac, 0) - NVL(storear, 0)) qte FROM stocouch@Heinens_Custom_Prod WHERE stocinr=cclcinrc AND stosite=cclsite AND stotpos=0)/ NB_SKU_CASE Inventory FROM DETAIL t WHERE NB_CASE_ORDERED > NB_CASE_PREP
